plot: Ahemt is a Turkish taxi driver who is married with Oliva, a Spanish housewive. They speak French, he is muselman and she is catholic.
title: I Speak French Like Tarzan
plot_es: Ahemt is a Turkish taxi driver who is married with Oliva, a Spanish housewive. They speak French, he is muselman and she is catholic.
plot_en: Ahemt is a Turkish taxi driver who is married with Oliva, a Spanish housewive. They speak French, he is muselman and she is catholic.
